🚀 PERFORMANCE: • Response Time • Throughput (RPS) • Error Rate • Cache Hit Ratio
💰 COST METRICS: • LLM API Costs • Infrastructure Spend • Cost per Request • Token Usage
👥 USER METRICS: • Active Users • Session Duration • Conversation Length • User Satisfaction
🔧 SYSTEM HEALTH: • CPU/Memory Usage • Disk I/O • Network Latency • Pod Restarts
🔐 SECURITY: • Failed Logins • API Rate Limits • Suspicious Activity • Certificate Expiry
🚨 Response Time > 5s 🚨 Error Rate > 5% 🚨 Memory Usage > 80% 🚨 LLM API Failures

🎯 AVAILABILITY SLO: • 99.9% uptime • 99% successful requests
⚡ PERFORMANCE SLO: • 95% requests < 2s • 99% requests < 5s
💰 COST SLO: • < $0.05 per request • 80% cache hit rate
📊 ERROR BUDGET: • 0.1% error allowance • Monthly budget burn

🔐 SECURITY MONITORING: • Authentication failures • Unusual access patterns • Data exfiltration attempts
📋 COMPLIANCE: • GDPR data handling • SOC 2 requirements • Audit trail logging • Data retention policies
